 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁלְיָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==after-birth== (= Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שִׁילְיְתָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁלְיָתָהּ‎</span> [[Deut.28.57|Deut 28:57]].
